resources.string: This application is just a database with pictures and quotes from the "JoJo Bizzare Adventure".
All rights on the pictures and audio belong to:
I am just a student and a big fan of Hirohiko Araki. I collected valuable pieces of art for you, fellow stand users, so use them wisely!
If it will be possible, I will try to update the database and add some functionality, but for now, that is it. Feel free to report bugs!
First aid when smth is bugged. Restart the app after.
